title: Second Derivative Explorer
description: Interactive visualization showing a function, its first derivative, and its second derivative in three synchronized panels. Demonstrates how the second derivative relates to concavity of the original function and the rate of change of the first derivative.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Second Derivative
Concavity
Inflection Points
Curvature
prerequisites: Understanding of first derivative as slope
Basic knowledge of polynomial and trigonometric functions
learningObjective: Students will analyze how the second derivative relates to the curvature of the original function
